query:
SET DATEFORMAT DMY;

DECLARE @dii datetime
DECLARE @dff datetime

SET @dii = '{{{req.query.startTs}}}'
SET @dff = '{{{req.query.endTs}}}'

IF (@dii = '')
BEGIN

SET @dii = dateadd(hour, -1, GETDATE())
SET @dff = GETDATE()

END

  select 

DATEADD(MINUTE, DATEDIFF(MINUTE, 0, [Data]), 0) as [Data]
  ,max([P1 Capta√ß√£o]) as [P1 Capta√ß√£o]
  ,max([P1 Capta√ß√£o Dia Atual]) as [P1 Capta√ß√£o Dia Atual]
  ,max([P1 N√≠vel]) as [P1 N√≠vel]

  ,max([P2 Capta√ß√£o]) as [P2 Capta√ß√£o]
  ,max([P2 Capta√ß√£o Dia Atual]) as [P2 Capta√ß√£o Dia Atual]
  ,max([P2 N√≠vel]) as [P2 N√≠vel]

  ,max([P3 Capta√ß√£o]) as [P3 Capta√ß√£o]
  ,max([P3 Capta√ß√£o Dia Atual]) as [P3 Capta√ß√£o Dia Atual]
  ,max([P3 N√≠vel]) as [P3 N√≠vel]

  ,max([P4 Capta√ß√£o]) as [P4 Capta√ß√£o]
  ,max([P4 Capta√ß√£o Dia Atual]) as [P4 Capta√ß√£o Dia Atual]
  ,max([P4 N√≠vel]) as [P4 N√≠vel]

  from
  (
  select

  [E3TimeStamp] as Data
, case when ([Parametro] = 'Capta√ß√£o' and [Maquina] = 'PO√áO 1' ) then Valor end as [P1 Capta√ß√£o]
, case when ([Parametro] = 'Capta√ß√£o Dia Atual' and [Maquina] = 'PO√áO 1')  then Valor end as [P1 Capta√ß√£o Dia Atual]
, case when ([Parametro] = 'N√≠vel' and [Maquina] = 'PO√áO 1')  then Valor end as [P1 N√≠vel]
, case when ([Parametro] = 'Capta√ß√£o' and [Maquina] = 'PO√áO 2' ) then Valor end as [P2 Capta√ß√£o]
, case when ([Parametro] = 'Capta√ß√£o Dia Atual' and [Maquina] = 'PO√áO 2')  then Valor end as [P2 Capta√ß√£o Dia Atual]
, case when ([Parametro] = 'N√≠vel' and [Maquina] = 'PO√áO 2')  then Valor end as [P2 N√≠vel]
, case when ([Parametro] = 'Capta√ß√£o' and [Maquina] = 'PO√áO 3' ) then Valor end as [P3 Capta√ß√£o]
, case when ([Parametro] = 'Capta√ß√£o Dia Atual' and [Maquina] = 'PO√áO 3')  then Valor end as [P3 Capta√ß√£o Dia Atual]
, case when ([Parametro] = 'N√≠vel' and [Maquina] = 'PO√áO 3')  then Valor end as [P3 N√≠vel]
, case when ([Parametro] = 'Capta√ß√£o' and [Maquina] = 'PO√áO 4' ) then Valor end as [P4 Capta√ß√£o]
, case when ([Parametro] = 'Capta√ß√£o Dia Atual' and [Maquina] = 'PO√áO 4')  then Valor end as [P4 Capta√ß√£o Dia Atual]
, case when ([Parametro] = 'N√≠vel' and [Maquina] = 'PO√áO 4')  then Valor end as [P4 N√≠vel]

  from [Tab_Dados_Historico]

  where (E3TimeStamp > @dii and E3TimeStamp < @dff)

  ) as temp

  group by 
  
DATEADD(MINUTE, DATEDIFF(MINUTE, 0, [Data]), 0) 



  order by 1 asc

name: HTML
Eventos
query:
SET DATEFORMAT dmy;

DECLARE @dii datetime
DECLARE @dff datetime
 
SET @dii = '{{{req.query.startTs}}}'
SET @dff = '{{{req.query.endTs}}}'

IF (@dii = '')
BEGIN

SET @dii = dateadd(hour, -1, GETDATE())
SET @dff = GETDATE()

END;


   
  WITH TABELABASE AS ( 
  
  SELECT * FROM( 
  SELECT   1 as [Index] 
  
  ,FORMAT([Partida_Bomba], 'dd/MM/yyyy HH:mm')  AS Partida_Bomba  
  ,FORMAT([Parada_Bomba], 'dd/MM/yyyy HH:mm')  AS Parada_Bomba  
  ,Maquina as Maquina 
  ,[Dura√ß√£o] as [Duracao] 
  
  
   ,CAST([Capta√ß√£o]/10.0 AS DECIMAL(10,1)) as [Captacao] 
   ,CAST([N√≠vel_Inicial]/10.0 AS DECIMAL(10,1)) as [Nivel_Inicial] 
  
   ,CAST([Efici√™ncia]/10.0 AS DECIMAL(10,1)) as [Eficiencia] 
  
  
   
   
  FROM Tab_Dados_Eventos_Po√ßos 
   
where  (CHARINDEX('PO√áO', Maquina) > 0 ) and ([Partida_Bomba] >= @dii AND [Partida_Bomba] <= @dff)  
  ) as tabtemp  
   
  )
  
  
  SELECT [Index],[Partida_Bomba],[Parada_Bomba], Maquina 
   
  ,  cast(([Duracao]/60) as varchar) + ' horas e ' + cast(([Duracao] - 60*([Duracao]/60)) as varchar) + ' minutos' as [Duracao] 
   
   
  ,cast(Captacao as float) AS Captacao,cast(Nivel_Inicial as float) AS Nivel_Inicial , cast(Eficiencia as float) AS Eficiencia FROM ( 
  SELECT * FROM TABELABASE 
  
   UNION ALL 
  
  SELECT 2 AS [Index], '' as Partida_Bomba, 'M√©dia' AS 'Parada_Bomba', '' as 'Maquina', round((avg([Duracao])),1) as  [Duracao], round((avg([Captacao])),1) as  [Captacao], round((avg([Nivel_Inicial])),1) as  [Nivel_Inicial], round((avg([Eficiencia])),1) as  [Eficiencia]   FROM TABELABASE 
  
  UNION ALL 
  
  SELECT 3 AS [Index], '' as Partida_Bomba,  'Total' AS 'Parada_Bomba', '' as 'Maquina', round((sum([Duracao])),1) as  [Duracao], round((sum([Captacao])),1) as  [Captacao], round((sum([Nivel_Inicial])),1) as  [Nivel_Inicial], round((sum([Eficiencia])),1) as  [Eficiencia]   FROM TABELABASE 
  ) AS TABTEMP 
  
  
 ORDER BY[Index] asc,SUBSTRING([Parada_Bomba], 7, 4) asc, SUBSTRING([Parada_Bomba], 4, 2) asc, SUBSTRING([Parada_Bomba], 1, 2) asc, SUBSTRING([Parada_Bomba], 12, 2) asc ,SUBSTRING([Parada_Bomba], 15, 2)  asc

name: function 3
format
func:
var payload = `

DECLARE @dii datetime
DECLARE @dff datetime

SET @dii = '${msg.req.query.startDateTime == undefined ? '' : msg.req.query.startDateTime}'
SET @dff = '${msg.req.query.endDateTime == undefined ? '' : msg.req.query.endDateTime}'

IF (@dii = '')
BEGIN

SET @dii = DATEADD(hour, -1, getdate())
SET @dff = getdate()

END

SET dateformat dmy 

SELECT      
		FORMAT(cast(E3TimeStamp as datetime),'dd/MM/yyyy HH:mm') AS Data,  
    ${msg.colunas},
    [Observa√ß√£o]
FROM (
    SELECT 
	FORMAT(cast(E3TimeStamp as datetime),'dd/MM/yyyy HH:mm') as E3TimeStamp, 
	Maquina, 
	Parametro, 
	Valor
    FROM 
	[Tab_Dados_Filtro]
	WHERE (E3TimeStamp > @dii) and (E3TimeStamp < @dff)
    AND Maquina = '${msg.filtro}'  

) AS PivotData
PIVOT (
    MAX(Valor) FOR Parametro IN (
    ${msg.colunas},
    [Observa√ß√£o]
    )

var payload = `

DECLARE @dii datetime
DECLARE @dff datetime

SET @dii = '${msg.req.query.startDateTime == undefined ? '' : msg.req.query.startDateTime}'
SET @dff = '${msg.req.query.endDateTime == undefined ? '' : msg.req.query.endDateTime}'

IF (@dii = '')
BEGIN

SET @dii = DATEADD(hour, -1, getdate())
SET @dff = getdate()

END

SET dateformat dmy 

SELECT      
		FORMAT(cast(E3TimeStamp as datetime),'dd/MM/yyyy HH:mm') AS Data,  
    ${msg.colunas},
    [Observa√ß√£o]
FROM (
    SELECT 
	FORMAT(cast(E3TimeStamp as datetime),'dd/MM/yyyy HH:mm') as E3TimeStamp, 
	Maquina, 
	Parametro, 
	Valor
    FROM 
	[Tab_Dados_Filtro]
	WHERE (E3TimeStamp > @dii) and (E3TimeStamp < @dff)
    AND Maquina = '${msg.filtro}'  

) AS PivotData
PIVOT (
    MAX(Valor) FOR Parametro IN (
    ${msg.colunas},
    [Observa√ß√£o]
    )
) AS PivotResult;

`

msg.payload = payload;

return msg;

name: query
func:
var payload = `

select 
s.name as sector,
r.name as recipe_sector,
temp.machine_name as machine,
temp.tag_name as tag,
pr.name as product,
rr.rows_per_packet as rows_per_packet,
rr.pieces_per_row as pieces_per_row,
s.sector_id as sector_id,
r.recipe_sector_id as recipe_sector_id,
temp.tag_id as tag_id,
temp.machine_id as machine_id,
pr.product_id,
rr.recipe_id

from sector s

left join recipe_sector r
on s.sector_id = r.sector_id

left join (
SELECT 
    recipe_sector.name as "recipe_sector_name",
	m.name as "machine_name",
    tag.name as "tag_name",
	recipe_sector.recipe_sector_id as "recipe_sector_id",
	tag.machine_id,
    tag.tag_id,
	recipe_sector.sector_id as "sector_id"
FROM tag

left join machine m
on tag.machine_id = m.machine_id
	
JOIN 
    tag_has_recipe_sector ON tag.tag_id = tag_has_recipe_sector.tag_id
JOIN 
    recipe_sector ON tag_has_recipe_sector.recipe_sector_id = recipe_sector.recipe_sector_id
) temp

on temp.recipe_sector_id = r.recipe_sector_id


left join recipe rr
on temp.tag_id = rr.tag_id

left join product pr
on rr.product_id = pr.product_id

where s.type = 'production_line'


group by 
s.name,
r.name,
rr.rows_per_packet,
rr.pieces_per_row,
pr.name,
s.sector_id,
r.recipe_sector_id,
temp.machine_name,
temp.tag_name,
temp.tag_id,
temp.machine_id,
pr.product_id,
rr.recipe_id

order by 
1 asc,
2 asc,
3 asc

`

msg.payload = payload;


return msg;

name: query
func:
var payload = `

with recipe_sectortemp as (
select
	
t.name as tag,
t.tag_id as tag_id,

m.name as machine,
m.machine_id as machine_id,

rs.name as recipe_sector,
rs.recipe_sector_id as recipe_sector_id,
    
s.name as sector,
s.sector_id as sector_id

from tag_has_recipe_sector thrs
left join tag t
on t.tag_id = thrs.tag_id
left join machine m
on t.machine_id = m.machine_id
left join recipe_sector rs
on thrs.recipe_sector_id = rs.recipe_sector_id
left join sector s
on rs.sector_id = s.sector_id

)


select distinct * from 

(

select 
tag_id as id,
tag as text,
'tag' as type,
machine_id as parent_id
from recipe_sectortemp

union all

select 
machine_id as id,
machine as text,
'machine' as type,
recipe_sector_id as parent_id
from recipe_sectortemp

union all

select 
recipe_sector_id as id,
name as text,
'recipe_sector' as type,
sector_id as parent_id
from recipe_sector

union all 

select 

sector_id as id,
name as text,
type as type,
sector_parent_id as parent_id

from sector

) as temp

where 
(
type != 'company'
and
type != 'unity'
and
type != 'factory'
)

`

msg.payload = payload;


return msg;

name: query
func:
var payload = `

with recipe_sectortemp as (
select
	
t.name as tag,
t.tag_id as tag_id,

m.name as machine,
m.machine_id as machine_id,

rs.name as recipe_sector,
rs.recipe_sector_id as recipe_sector_id,
    
s.name as sector,
s.sector_id as sector_id

from tag_has_recipe_sector thrs
left join tag t
on t.tag_id = thrs.tag_id
left join machine m
on t.machine_id = m.machine_id
left join recipe_sector rs
on thrs.recipe_sector_id = rs.recipe_sector_id
left join sector s
on rs.sector_id = s.sector_id

)


select distinct * from 

(

select 
tag_id as id,
tag as text,
'tag' as type,
machine_id as parent_id
from recipe_sectortemp

union all

select 
machine_id as id,
machine as text,
'machine' as type,
recipe_sector_id as parent_id
from recipe_sectortemp

union all

select 
recipe_sector_id as id,
name as text,
'recipe_sector' as type,
sector_id as parent_id
from recipe_sector

union all 

select 

sector_id as id,
name as text,
type as type,
sector_parent_id as parent_id

from sector

) as temp

`;

msg.payload = payload;


return msg;

name: query
func:
var payload = `

select 
c.name as company,
s.name as sector,
r.name as recipe_sector,
temp.machine_name as machine,
temp.tag_name as tag,

c.company_id as company_id,
s.sector_id as sector_id,
r.recipe_sector_id as recipe_sector_id,
temp.tag_id as tag_id,
temp.machine_id as machine_id

from company c

left join sector s
on (c.company_id = s.company_id) and (s.type = 'production line')

left join recipe_sector r
on s.sector_id = r.sector_id


left join (
SELECT 
    recipe_sector.name as "recipe_sector_name",
	m.name as "machine_name",
    tag.name as "tag_name",
	recipe_sector.recipe_sector_id as "recipe_sector_id",
	tag.machine_id,
    tag.tag_id,
	recipe_sector.sector_id as "sector_id"
FROM tag

left join machine m
on tag.machine_id = m.machine_id
	
JOIN 
    tag_has_recipe_sector ON tag.tag_id = tag_has_recipe_sector.tag_id
JOIN 
    recipe_sector ON tag_has_recipe_sector.recipe_sector_id = recipe_sector.recipe_sector_id
) temp

on temp.recipe_sector_id = r.recipe_sector_id

group by 
c.name,
s.name,
r.name,
c.company_id,
s.sector_id,
r.recipe_sector_id,
temp.machine_name,
temp.tag_name,
temp.tag_id,
temp.machine_id

order by 
1 asc,
2 asc,
3 asc
`

msg.payload = payload;


return msg;

func:
var sector_uuid = msg.req.headers.sector_uuid;    
var recipe_sector_uuid = msg.req.headers.recipe_sector_uuid;    

var payload = `

select 
s.name as sector,
case when p.product_id = r.product_id then p.name || ' [carregado]' else p.name end,
p.product_id as product_id,
s.sector_id,
rs.recipe_sector_id,
r.product_id as product_carregado

from sector s

left join recipe_sector rs
on s.sector_id = rs.sector_id

left join product p
on s.sector_id = p.sector_id

left join (

select 
	
t.name as tag,
t.tag_id,
thrs.recipe_sector_id
	
from tag t
	
left join tag_has_recipe_sector thrs
on t.tag_id = thrs.tag_id

) t

on 
rs.recipe_sector_id = t.recipe_sector_id

left join recipe r
on
get_recipe(t.tag_id, now()::timestamp) = r.recipe_id

where 
(s.type = 'production_line')
and
s.sector_id = '${sector_uuid}' 
and
rs.recipe_sector_id = '${recipe_sector_uuid}'

group by 

s.name,
p.name,
p.product_id,
s.sector_id,
rs.recipe_sector_id,
r.product_id


`

msg.payload = payload;


return msg;

name: query
func:
var product_uuid = msg.req.params.product_uuid;   
                
var recipe_sector_uuid = msg.req.params.recipe_sector_uuid; 

var payload = `


select
s.name as sector,
r.name as recipe_sector,
temp.machine_name as machine,
temp.tag_name as tag,
pr.name as product,
pr.description as description,
pr.dimensions as dimensions,
pr.square_meter as square_meter,
rr.rows_per_packet as rows_per_packet,
rr.pieces_per_row as pieces_per_row,
s.sector_id as sector_id,
r.recipe_sector_id as recipe_sector_id,
temp.tag_id as tag_id,
temp.machine_id as machine_id,
pr.product_id,
rr.recipe_id

from sector s

left join recipe_sector r
on s.sector_id = r.sector_id

left join (
SELECT
    recipe_sector.name as "recipe_sector_name",
	m.name as "machine_name",
    tag.name as "tag_name",
	recipe_sector.recipe_sector_id as "recipe_sector_id",
	tag.machine_id,
    tag.tag_id,
	recipe_sector.sector_id as "sector_id"
FROM tag

left join machine m
on tag.machine_id = m.machine_id

JOIN
    tag_has_recipe_sector ON tag.tag_id = tag_has_recipe_sector.tag_id
JOIN
    recipe_sector ON tag_has_recipe_sector.recipe_sector_id = recipe_sector.recipe_sector_id
) temp

on temp.recipe_sector_id = r.recipe_sector_id

left join recipe rr
on temp.tag_id = rr.tag_id

left join product pr
on rr.product_id = pr.product_id

where
pr.product_id = '${product_uuid}'
and 
s.type = 'production_line'

group by 
s.name,
r.name,
rr.rows_per_packet,
rr.pieces_per_row,
pr.name,
s.sector_id,
r.recipe_sector_id,
temp.machine_name,
temp.tag_name,
temp.tag_id,
temp.machine_id,
pr.product_id,
rr.recipe_id

union all

select 

null as sector,
null as recipe_sector,
null as machine,
null as tag,
name as product,
description,
dimensions,
square_meter,
null as rows_per_packet,
null as pieces_per_row,
sector_id as sector_id,
null as recipe_sector_id,
null as tag_id,
null as machine_id,
product_id as product_id,
null as recipe_id

from product 
	
where
product_id = '${product_uuid}'

order by 
1 asc,
2 asc,
3 asc


`

msg.payload = payload;


return msg;

name: not is null
func:
var uuid = msg.req.headers.uuid;    
var parent_uuid = msg.req.headers.parent_uuid;    

var payload = `

with temporaria as (

select 
s.name as sector,
r.name as recipe_sector,
temp.machine_name as machine,
temp.tag_name as tag,
	
	
	
pr.name as product,
max(rup.created_at) as recipe_update,
rup.recipe_id,

pr.product_id as product_id,

s.sector_id as sector_id,
r.recipe_sector_id as recipe_sector_id,
temp.tag_id as tag_id,
temp.machine_id as machine_id

from sector s


left join recipe_sector r
on s.sector_id = r.sector_id


left join (
SELECT 
    recipe_sector.name as "recipe_sector_name",
	m.name as "machine_name",
    tag.name as "tag_name",
	recipe_sector.recipe_sector_id as "recipe_sector_id",
	tag.machine_id,
    tag.tag_id,
	recipe_sector.sector_id as "sector_id"
FROM tag

left join machine m
on tag.machine_id = m.machine_id
	
JOIN 
    tag_has_recipe_sector ON tag.tag_id = tag_has_recipe_sector.tag_id
JOIN 
    recipe_sector ON tag_has_recipe_sector.recipe_sector_id = recipe_sector.recipe_sector_id
) temp

on temp.recipe_sector_id = r.recipe_sector_id


left join recipe rec
on temp.tag_id = rec.tag_id

left join product pr
on rec.product_id = pr.product_id

left join recipe_updates rup
on (rec.recipe_id = rup.recipe_id)

where (s.type = 'production_line')

group by 
s.name,
r.name,
s.sector_id,
r.recipe_sector_id,
temp.machine_name,
temp.tag_name,
temp.tag_id,
temp.machine_id,
pr.product_id,
pr.name,
rup.recipe_id

),

 recipeupdatetemp as (
select 
ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY recipe_sector ORDER BY (recipe_update) DESC) AS rank,
recipe_sector,
product,
product_id,

recipe_update,
recipe_sector_id,
recipe_id

from temporaria


where 
recipe_sector is not null
and 
recipe_update is not null

group by 
recipe_sector,
product,
recipe_sector_id,
recipe_id,
recipe_update,
product_id

),

recipeupdate as (
select * from recipeupdatetemp

where rank = 1

),



temprecipesector as 
(
select 

s.name as sector,
pr.name as product,
pr.product_id,
s.sector_id as sector_id,
'${uuid}' as recipe_sector_id,
recup.recipe_update

from product pr

left join sector s

on (pr.sector_id = s.sector_id)

left join recipeupdate recup
on 
recup.recipe_sector_id = '${uuid}' and recup.product_id = pr.product_id

where s.sector_id = '${parent_uuid}' 

)

select 
sector,
case when recipe_update is not null then product || ' [carregado]' else product end,
product_id,
sector_id,
recipe_sector_id,
recipe_update

from
temprecipesector


`

msg.payload = payload;


return msg;
